events.name: EU launches legal action against the UK over Northern Ireland protocol bill
events.wd_label: EU launches legal action against the UK over Northern Ireland protocol bill
events.wd_description: The European Union expressed anger over the UK's legislation overriding the post-Brexit arrangement for Northern Ireland and launched four legal cases against the UK government.
events.description: The European Union expressed anger over the UK's legislation overriding the post-Brexit arrangement for Northern Ireland and launched four legal cases against the UK government.

events.name: protocol bill approval
events.wd_description: The Northern Ireland protocol bill was approved at its third hearing in the House of Commons by 267 votes to 195 and will proceed to the House of Lords in the autumn.
events.description: The Northern Ireland protocol bill was approved at its third hearing in the House of Commons by 267 votes to 195 and will proceed to the House of Lords in the autumn.

events.name: EU legal action
events.wd_description: The European Union launched four legal cases against the UK government in response to the passage of the Northern Ireland protocol bill.
events.description: The European Union launched four legal cases against the UK government in response to the passage of the Northern Ireland protocol bill.

events.name: potential fines
events.wd_description: The EU court has the power to impose multimillion-euro fines on the UK, potentially leading to punitive action through Brexit deal mechanisms.
events.description: The EU court has the power to impose multimillion-euro fines on the UK, potentially leading to punitive action through Brexit deal mechanisms.

events.name: EU commission statement
events.wd_description: The European Commission stated that the legal action was partly due to the continued passage of the Northern Ireland protocol bill, which goes against the spirit of collective solutions.
events.description: The European Commission stated that the legal action was partly due to the continued passage of the Northern Ireland protocol bill, which goes against the spirit of collective solutions.

events.name: China announces countermeasures against the US following Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_label: China announces countermeasures against the US following Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry announced countermeasures against Washington, including the suspension of climate talks and military communications, following Speaker Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry announced countermeasures against Washington, including the suspension of climate talks and military communications, following Speaker Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.

events.name: suspension of climate talks
events.wd_description: China announced the suspension of climate talks with the US as part of its countermeasures following Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.
events.description: China announced the suspension of climate talks with the US as part of its countermeasures following Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.

events.name: cancellation of military communications
events.wd_description: China canceled future phone calls and messages between Chinese and US defense leaders and annual naval meetings under the China-US military maritime consultation mechanism.
events.description: China canceled future phone calls and messages between Chinese and US defense leaders and annual naval meetings under the China-US military maritime consultation mechanism.

events.name: Chinese Foreign Ministry statement
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry stated that Pelosi's visit seriously interfered with China’s internal affairs and threatened peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry stated that Pelosi's visit seriously interfered with China’s internal affairs and threatened peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait.

events.name: sanctions on Pelosi
events.wd_description: Beijing sanctioned Pelosi and her immediate family members over her visit to Taiwan and stepped up military drills and warplane incursions around the island.
events.description: Beijing sanctioned Pelosi and her immediate family members over her visit to Taiwan and stepped up military drills and warplane incursions around the island.

events.name: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_label: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.

events.name: discovery of graves
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.

events.name: Center for Strategic Communications statement
events.wd_description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.
events.description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.

events.name: context of Izium's occupation
events.wd_description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.
events.description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.

events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for EV batteries, particularly lithium-ion batteries, is under increasing strain due to rising demand for electric vehicles and geopolitical and environmental challenges.
events.description: The supply chain for EV batteries, particularly lithium-ion batteries, is under increasing strain due to rising demand for electric vehicles and geopolitical and environmental challenges.

events.name: production
events.wd_description: The production of lithium-ion batteries is heavily reliant on mining and processing of raw materials, which are concentrated in a few key countries and subject to geopolitical risks.
events.description: The production of lithium-ion batteries is heavily reliant on mining and processing of raw materials, which are concentrated in a few key countries and subject to geopolitical risks.

events.name: t: China’s dominance
events.wd_description: China controls a significant portion of the global lithium-ion battery supply chain, including 79% of battery production and 61% of lithium refining.
events.description: China controls a significant portion of the global lithium-ion battery supply chain, including 79% of battery production and 61% of lithium refining.

events.name: t: geopolitical risks
events.wd_description: Events like COVID-19 and the war in Ukraine have disrupted the supply chain, affecting the availability of critical materials such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel.
events.description: Events like COVID-19 and the war in Ukraine have disrupted the supply chain, affecting the availability of critical materials such as cobalt, lithium, and nickel.

events.name: t: U.S. initiatives
events.wd_description: The U.S. is investing in domestic production and processing of lithium-ion batteries, including a $2.91 billion initiative by the DOE to boost production and recycling facilities.
events.description: The U.S. is investing in domestic production and processing of lithium-ion batteries, including a $2.91 billion initiative by the DOE to boost production and recycling facilities.

events.name: t: new technology
events.wd_description: Innovations such as those by Lilac Solutions and Princeton NuEnergy aim to improve lithium recovery and battery recycling, easing supply chain constraints.
events.description: Innovations such as those by Lilac Solutions and Princeton NuEnergy aim to improve lithium recovery and battery recycling, easing supply chain constraints.

events.name: price
events.wd_description: The price of lithium has surged due to increased demand for batteries, rising over 900% since 2021, affecting the cost of electric vehicles and prompting contract renegotiations.
events.description: The price of lithium has surged due to increased demand for batteries, rising over 900% since 2021, affecting the cost of electric vehicles and prompting contract renegotiations.

events.name: t: inflation
events.wd_description: Inflation has exacerbated the rising costs of lithium-ion batteries, leading to higher prices for electric vehicles and delays in project commissioning.
events.description: Inflation has exacerbated the rising costs of lithium-ion batteries, leading to higher prices for electric vehicles and delays in project commissioning.

events.name: transportation/flammability
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries are regulated as hazardous materials due to their flammability and high energy density, which pose risks during transportation and storage.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries are regulated as hazardous materials due to their flammability and high energy density, which pose risks during transportation and storage.

events.name: t: regulation
events.wd_description: The U.S. Department of Transportation regulates lithium-ion batteries as hazardous materials, requiring companies to take precautions during transactions and transport.
events.description: The U.S. Department of Transportation regulates lithium-ion batteries as hazardous materials, requiring companies to take precautions during transactions and transport.

events.name: t: fire risk
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries can overheat and ignite under certain conditions, making fires difficult to extinguish and posing significant risks during transport.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries can overheat and ignite under certain conditions, making fires difficult to extinguish and posing significant risks during transport.
